ygData.subject: Re: TWINK!
ygData.msgSnippet: My personal opinion is that you should not be very pissed as you put it true wizard vamp ... the full suit of totemic was probably not a gift from someone
ygData.messageBody:
My personal opinion is that you should not be
"very pissed" as you put it "true wizard vamp"... the
full suit of totemic was probably not a "gift" from
someone else but rather gathered by another one of his
characters (of obviosly a higher level) therefore he has
spent the "play time" to get a character high enough to
earn totemic armor and if the character wearing it did
not get it himself the player playing the character
still spent the time and money to get the armor (just
on another character) so it was still earned... in
my humble opinion at least...<br>also on tribunal by
the way...<br><br>Anomia Poisonwolf 41st
druid<br>Hafta (gnome warrior) 16th<br>Serated (woodelf rogue)
15th<br>Mirrored (darkelf enchanter) 12th<br>((and all 3 of my
alters are quite twinked))
